page.title: 11Life-styles in Longdon
page.content: The average{age}of the{population}of Longdon is{50 and rising. Most people have cars as the{bus}to {Tewkesbury}runs but{twice weekly. There is a{public telephone} in the village, but many house-holders have their{own phone,}essential in case of {illness or emergency. There is{no doctor's surgery }in the village, the{nearest}being located in {Tewkesbury (5miles) or Upton-on-Severn {(3m).}There is a{sub post office }next to the Plough, the village pub. The inhabitants like the {peaceful, {"country" pace}of the village, where nearly everyone knows one another. There is a good community spirit and neighbours are there to be called upon when needed. The population is mainly made up of families who have lived in the area for many years.
